General.Name: Sichuan Em Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Em Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of new materials worldwide. The company offers optical PET based films, specific electronic resins, flame retardant polyester chips and special grades, polyvinyl butyral resins and interlayers, and active pharmaceutical ingredients and pharmaceutical intermediates. It also provides PET films and chips, adhesive tapes and protection films, thermosetting composites, moulding compounds, laminates and machine parts, mica tapes, precision coating products, polypropylene films for capacitor, and protection/release films, as well as polycarbonate and polypropylene films and sheets. The company serves power generation equipment, UHV power transmission, smart energy grid, new energy vehicles, rail transportation, optoelectronic displays, consumer electronics, 5G communication, and electrical appliances industries. Sichuan Em Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 is headquartered in Mianyang, China.
